RTKDeviceStatusFlags
ValueMap

Map indicating the bits that define each value STATE  - 0x000000FF - Device State:  00000000000000000000000011111111 STATUS_CODE  - 0x0000FF00 - Status Code:  00000000000000001111111100000000 RESET_REASON  - 0x00030000 - Reset Reason:  00000000000000110000000000000000 MODEM_POWERED  - 0x00040000 - Modem Powered:  00000000000001000000000000000000 CELL_CONNECTED  - 0x00080000 - Cell Connected:  00000000000010000000000000000000 SERVER_CONNECTED  - 0x00100000 - Server Connected:  00000000000100000000000000000000 DATA_ENABLED  - 0x00200000 - Data Enabled:  00000000001000000000000000000000

ResetReason

Possible RTK reset reason values POWER_ON  - 0x00000000 - Reset due to Power-on HARDWARE_RESET  - 0x00010000 - Hardware reset SOFT_RESET  - 0x00020000 - Soft reset WATCHDOG_RESET  - 0x00030000 - Watchdog reset

state
uint8 state() const
statusCode
uint8 statusCode() const
resetReason
ResetReason resetReason() const
modemPowered
bool modemPowered() const
cellConnected
bool cellConnected()
serverConnected
bool serverConnected()
dataEnabled
bool dataEnabled()
